trans-unit.source: Request a maps authentication key
trans-unit.target: Request a maps authentication key

trans-unit.source: Your Universal Windows app must be authenticated before it can use the MapControl and map services in the Windows.Services.Maps namespace.
trans-unit.target: Your Universal Windows app must be authenticated before it can use the MapControl and map services in the Windows.Services.Maps namespace.

trans-unit.source: Request a maps authentication key
trans-unit.target: Request a maps authentication key

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Your [Universal Windows app](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894631) must be authenticated before it can use the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) and map services in the [**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.
trans-unit.target: Your [Universal Windows app](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894631) must be authenticated before it can use the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) and map services in the [**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate your app, you must specify a maps authentication key.
trans-unit.target: To authenticate your app, you must specify a maps authentication key.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to request a maps authentication key from the [Bing Maps Developer Center](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/) and add it to your app.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to request a maps authentication key from the [Bing Maps Developer Center](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/) and add it to your app.

trans-unit.source: **Tip** To learn more about using maps in your app, download the following sample from the [Windows-universal-samples repo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619979) on GitHub:
trans-unit.target: **Tip** To learn more about using maps in your app, download the following sample from the [Windows-universal-samples repo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619979) on GitHub:

trans-unit.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) map sample
trans-unit.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) map sample

trans-unit.source: Get a key
trans-unit.target: Get a key

trans-unit.source: Create and manage map authentication keys for your Universal Windows apps using the [Bing Maps Developer Center](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/).
trans-unit.target: Create and manage map authentication keys for your Universal Windows apps using the [Bing Maps Developer Center](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/).

trans-unit.source: To create a new key
trans-unit.target: To create a new key

trans-unit.source: In your browser, navigate to the Bing Maps Developer Center ([https://www.bingmapsportal.com](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/)).
trans-unit.target: In your browser, navigate to the Bing Maps Developer Center ([https://www.bingmapsportal.com](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/)).

trans-unit.source: If you are asked to sign in, enter your Microsoft account and click **Sign in**.
trans-unit.target: If you are asked to sign in, enter your Microsoft account and click **Sign in**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the account to associate with your Bing Maps account.
trans-unit.target: Choose the account to associate with your Bing Maps account.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use your Microsoft account, click **Yes**.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use your Microsoft account, click **Yes**.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, click **Sign in with another account**.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, click **Sign in with another account**.

trans-unit.source: If you don't already have a Bing Maps account, create a new Bing Maps account.
trans-unit.target: If you don't already have a Bing Maps account, create a new Bing Maps account.

trans-unit.source: Enter the **Account Name**, **Contact Name**, **Company Name**, **Email Address**, and **Phone Number**.
trans-unit.target: Enter the **Account Name**, **Contact Name**, **Company Name**, **Email Address**, and **Phone Number**.

trans-unit.source: After accepting the terms of use, click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: After accepting the terms of use, click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: Under the **My account** menu, click **Create or view keys**.
trans-unit.target: Under the **My account** menu, click **Create or view keys**.

trans-unit.source: Click on the link **to create a new key**.
trans-unit.target: Click on the link **to create a new key**.

trans-unit.source: Complete the **Create Key** form and then click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Complete the **Create Key** form and then click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: **Application name:** The name of your application.
trans-unit.target: **Application name:** The name of your application.

trans-unit.source: **Application URL (optional):** The URL of your application.
trans-unit.target: **Application URL (optional):** The URL of your application.

trans-unit.source: **Key type:** Select **Basic** or **Enterprise**.
trans-unit.target: **Key type:** Select **Basic** or **Enterprise**.

trans-unit.source: **Application type:** Select **Universal Windows App** for use in your Universal Windows app.
trans-unit.target: **Application type:** Select **Universal Windows App** for use in your Universal Windows app.

trans-unit.source: This is an example of what the form looks like.
trans-unit.target: This is an example of what the form looks like.

trans-unit.source: an example of the create key form.
trans-unit.target: an example of the create key form.

trans-unit.source: After you click **Create**, the new key appears below the **Create Key** form.
trans-unit.target: After you click **Create**, the new key appears below the **Create Key** form.

trans-unit.source: Copy it to a safe place or immediately add it to your app, as described in the next step.
trans-unit.target: Copy it to a safe place or immediately add it to your app, as described in the next step.

trans-unit.source: Add the key to your app
trans-unit.target: Add the key to your app

trans-unit.source: The map authentication key is required to use the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) and map services ([**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979)) in your Universal Windows app.
trans-unit.target: The map authentication key is required to use the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) and map services ([**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979)) in your Universal Windows app.

trans-unit.source: Add it to the map control and map service objects, as applicable.
trans-unit.target: Add it to the map control and map service objects, as applicable.

trans-unit.source: To add the key to a map control
trans-unit.target: To add the key to a map control

trans-unit.source: To authenticate the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004), set the [**MapServiceToken**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637036) property to the authentication key value.
trans-unit.target: To authenticate the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004), set the [**MapServiceToken**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637036) property to the authentication key value.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property in code or in XAML markup, depending on your preferences.
trans-unit.target: You can set this property in code or in XAML markup, depending on your preferences.

trans-unit.source: For more info about using the **MapControl**, see [Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views](display-maps.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info about using the **MapControl**, see [Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views](display-maps.md).

trans-unit.source: This example sets the **MapServiceToken** to the value of the authentication key in code.
trans-unit.target: This example sets the **MapServiceToken** to the value of the authentication key in code.

trans-unit.source: This example sets the **MapServiceToken** to the value of the authentication key in XAML markup.
trans-unit.target: This example sets the **MapServiceToken** to the value of the authentication key in XAML markup.

trans-unit.source: To add the key to map services
trans-unit.target: To add the key to map services

trans-unit.source: To use services in the [**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace, set the [**ServiceToken**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636977) property to the authentication key value.
trans-unit.target: To use services in the [**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace, set the [**ServiceToken**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636977) property to the authentication key value.

trans-unit.source: For more info about using map services, see [Display routes and directions](routes-and-directions.md) and [Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding](geocoding.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info about using map services, see [Display routes and directions](routes-and-directions.md) and [Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding](geocoding.md).

trans-unit.source: This example sets the **ServiceToken** to the value of the authentication key in code.
trans-unit.target: This example sets the **ServiceToken** to the value of the authentication key in code.
